name: WooCommerce Change Button Text
author: Milos Bejda

sections.description: This WooCommerce extension gives ability to the store owner to change the ‘add to cart’ button text on most of the products. A great WooCommerce extension to promote catalog products or promote sales in WooCommerce.
sections.installation:
Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page. For more detailed instructions on how to install WordPress plugins, please visit
Bejda.com
sections.faq:
Do you do custom plugin development services?

Yes, you can contact me through my website. Bejda.com
